all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Let no man be afraid to lay down his life for my sake; for whoso layeth down his life for my sake shall find it again.
Doctrine and Covenants 103:27
Quote of the Day
"We feel God’s love when we do things that draw us closer to Him … and stop doing things that distance us from Him."
Elder Benjamin M. Z. Tai | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
